title: Chairman Bernanke's Comments on Emerging from the Crisis: Where Do We Stand?
content: EMBARGOED for release at   9:00 p.m. EST November 18, 2010  (3:00 a.m. local time, November 19, 2010)    Delivery scheduled 5:45 a.m. EST (11:45 a.m. local time) November 19, 2010    Panel Discussion at the European Central Bank:  Emerging from the Crisis:  Where Do We Stand?    Remarks by     Ben S. Bernanke     Chairman     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at the      Sixth European Central Bank Central Banking Conference     Frankfurt, Germany         November 19, 2010
